name: Run and Retry
description:
Welcome to RUN & RETRY. In this nervous FPS, you must progress speeding to beat timer.
You will have a great mobility, with many movements mecanics allowing rapid progress.
You can run fast, but warning, do not confuse speed with haste.
Jump is very important to progress, double jump is a good asset, but with bad timing, it's death.
When you arrive with full speed, a good slide can save you !
Wall run is a speedy mecanic, allowing to take verticality.
Bomb is as a rocket jump, but you can place it with precision to maximise speed.
You can take verticality or to move forward.
Teleport help you in many difficults situations, when you miss a platform, a telport is welcome.
You also can use it to progress with more speed or reach to a higher point.
Levels are buiding to miximise speed and leave the choice to player,he can use different abilities to progress, or different paths.
This important element is to do with the best timer.

Choose Your Gameplay But Never Forget the Speed !
